column2: All Saints was founded in 1966 as two teacher-training colleges with about 300 students. We now have closer to 2,500 students studying courses including Media, Business, Psychology, Humanities, Journalism, Sport and Health, and we still train teachers!

column1: In 2006-7 we are celebrating our forty year anniversary. Everyone&rsquo
column2: s invited to join in, not least current and former students and staff,  and anyone who has been involved with Trinity &amp
column3: All Saints since we were founded.

column1: Like any good anniversary, it is a chance to look back at what we&rsquo
column2: ve achieved, celebrate the successes of students and staff, get back in touch with old friends, and think about the future.

column1: We have a growing list of activities running from September 2006 to August 2007: we hope you can join us.
